name: Manhattan
description: Manhattan is a TV series starring Rachel Brosnahan, Michael Chernus, and Christopher Denham. In 1943, in Los Alamos, New Mexico, a team of government scientists is working on the top secret Manhattan Project in a race to produce an...

review.name: Seems Like a Lot of Shark Jumping
review.reviewBody: I started out as a big fan of this show, partly for the science, whether or not it was accurate relative to history. And I was prepared to put up with the soap opera, "Dallas" qualities. But, I've become increasingly dissatisfied with the prurient and, mostly, implausible story lines. The writers seem to have dedicated themselves to fabricating multiple subplots that they think will dazzle in complexity........flashbacks, dream sequences........not to speak of eavesdropping and other tired devices. (I'm waiting for amnesia.) To me it's turned into a mess, and I've begun to have this visual image 4 or 5 Fonzies lined up on water skis. Sadly, I've decided to tune out.

trailer.name: Season 2 First Look
trailer.description: First look at Season 2 of Manhattan on WGN America.
